<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Delete purchase order by ID"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/store/order/{orderId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



For valid response try integer IDs with value &lt; 1000. Anything above 1000 or nonintegers will generate API errors

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
>
  <Translate id="theme.openapi.request.title">Request</Translate>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"orderId","in":"path","description":"ID of the order that needs to be deleted","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","minimum":1}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"400":{"description":"Invalid ID supplied"},"404":{"description":"Order not found"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
